document.full_text: a u.s. federal judge dismissed a lawsuit filed by a group of pension funds against freddie mac  that claimed the mortgage finance giant had materially misrepresented its exposure to risky mortgage products, leading to investment losses.
document.title: judge dismisses pension funds' lawsuit against freddie mac
lines_and_colors: a u.s. federal judge dismissed a lawsuit filed by a group of pension funds against freddie mac  that claimed the mortgage finance giant had materially misrepresented its exposure to risky mortgage products, leading to investment losses.
